full_text:
REGULATION OF GAMES.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,289, Eff. 10/3/10.)

	All bingo games, and all activities in connection therewith shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions of Sections 326.3 and 326.5 of the Penal Code of the State of California, as amended from time to time.

2.catch_line: Authority To Issue License And Prescribe Rules And Regulations.

6.catch_line: Purchase Of Bingo Supplies Or Equipment.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

REGULATION OF GAMES. (§ 44.53)

  REGULATION OF GAMES.
	(Amended by Ord. No. 181,289, Eff. 10/3/10.)	All bingo games, and all
activities in connection therewith shall be conducted in accordance with the
provisions of Sections 326.3 and 326.5 of the Penal Code of the State of
California, as amended from time to time.
